title: Unchained Alistar OCE
body: I was wondering if it was possible to get Unchained Alistar on OCE.  If there is any way to do this please comment, THANKS!

replies.body:
I think your best bet is to send in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) with proof that you have subscribed to the[ Riot youtube channel. ](https://www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc)

Good luck ♥
How to get Unchained Alistar for free
How do i get alistar skin???

As Yaiamone has already stated in this thread, your best bet is to contact [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) (you *may* need to provide proof you've subscribed to the Riot games Youtube channel, depending on who picks up the ticket).

Also note, this thread is from a year ago, and the boards have rules regarding thread "necros" (posting on very old threads). It pays to look at the time a thread was posted if you find it through the boards search function or online search engines such as Google.
Thank you support team for skin :)
Just do the requirements and send a support ticket. I got all 3 skins.
